title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama API; pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer for Ollama models; drop-in LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive terminal UI for chatting with Ollama models written in Go.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB for question-answering.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside the editor via side panel or floating window.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama; Maven Central artifact ollama4j.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) inference.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models to your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, quantization, and advanced usage patterns with Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that proxies to Ollama with session memory and markdown export.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate ollama-rs providing async client and strong typing for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note summarization and Q&A.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes OpenAI-compatible endpoints backed by Ollama for easy drop-in replacement.
